ProductInfo.Features:
Storage: 3 SATA hard drives up to 2TB each for a total of 6TB maximum (not included) Archive interface: Internal DVD-RW (included), 2x USB for external HDD, external CD/DVD writer, or USB flash drive. Video camera inputs: 16
Outputs: 1 x BNC, 1 x S-Video, 1 x VGA, 1 x SPOT; Audio input: 16 x RCA; Audio output: 1 x RCA; Sensor inputs: 16
Alarm outputs: 1; Operating system: Embedded Linux OS; Display speed: 480 frames per second (FPS) maximum; Maximum resolution: 720x480 (NTSC)
Split screen: 1, 4, 8, 16; Video compression: H.264; Recording resolutions supported: 720x480, 720x240, 360x240
Power consumption: 90w; Operating humidity: Max 80%; Weight: 9.0kg; Dimensions: 440mm (W) x 420mm (D) x 90mm (H)
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel H.264 Digital Video Recorder (DVR) w/ DVD±RW - 480FPS
